medical_history.chief_complaint: Lower abdominal pain, anorexia, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior to presentation, specifically lower abdominal pain starting yesterday at 4pm, initially mild but progressed to severe by this morning. Symptoms are aggravated by coughing/laughing and a car ride to the hospital.
